name: Echoes of the Void
description:
Surrounded only by remnants of life in the desolate vacuum of space, can this lone astronaut piece together the clues around them to uncover the fate of their lost crewmates?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Directions: Find the 8 notes left behind by your fallen peers and an escape pod while avoiding asteroids and ship debris before you succumb to the abyss yourself. 

Controls: WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera

Left Click - Toggle Flashlight

Escape- Pause the Game

Spacebar - Interact with the Escape Pod.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Contributors:

  • Programming - Light
  • Programming, Art, Writing - Jiggles
  • Programming, Art, Audio - Blawnodes
